alert.note: Alert for Leslie (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:12AM EDT until August 01 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A FLOOD WARNING IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Bell, Harlan, Knox, Leslie, Letcher and Perry. * WHEN...The Flood Warning is in effect until 11 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Some roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 808 AM EDT, flooding was ongoing. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Harlan, Cumberland, Loyall, Evarts, Lynch, Benham, Wallins Creek, Rosspoint, Golden Ash, Kitts, Clovertown, Harlan Gas, Coxton, Baxter, Ages, Sunshine, Tway, Chevrolet, Putney and Elcomb.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
